titleStmt.title: The fountaine of selfe-loue. Or Cynthias reuels As it hath beene sundry times priuately acted in the Black-Friers by the Children of her Maiesties Chappell. Written by Ben: Iohnson.
titleStmt.author: Jonson, Ben, 1573?-1637.

publicationStmt.publisher: [By R. Read] for Walter Burre, and are to be solde at his shop in Paules Church-yard, at the signe of the Flower de-Luce and Crowne,

notesStmt.note: Variant: with added dedication leaf to (1) William Camden or (2) Lucy, Countess of Bedford.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
